Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Coney Island in 1974...
Traded from Coney Island to Boston (UBA) on 1/31/1974 (Going to CI: P C. Clutter, P W. Boehmer. Going to PIL: 1B J. Castle)...
Had first career hit on 8/29/1974, off Raymond Satterwhite (TRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/8/1974, off Walter Morning (Ash)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1975, hitting .374 with 10 HR, 20 RBI...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pontiac, driving in 5 runs on 7/5/1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1975, hitting .391 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1975, hitting .319 with 9 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1975, hitting .319 with 40 HR, 113 RBI...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1975, hitting .319 with 40 HR, 113 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1976, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Penn on 8/9/1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1978, hitting .600 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1978, hitting .394 with 5 HR, 20 RBI...
Traded from Boston (UBA) to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1979 (Going to PIL: LF D. Brown, 3B M. Tate, P J. Santana. Going to PIT: 1B J. Castle)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1979, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Columbus on 5/24/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/26/1979, hitting .529 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 7/19/1979...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1980, hitting .360 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1980, hitting .524 with 5 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1981, hitting .458 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1981, hitting .372 with 8 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1981, hitting .354 with 5 HR, 15 RBI...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1981...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1981, hitting .316 with 26 HR, 87 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1982, hitting .458 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Columbus on 2/15/1985 to a 2-year deal worth $3,555,555 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1985, hitting .591 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1985, hitting .448 with 7 HR, 19 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/11/1986, off Sean Savino (SHP)...
